item.title: The Complete NFT Course: Become an NFT Creator & Investor
item.description: Ever since Bitcoin forced most people to learn about cryptocurrencies in recent years, there hasn’t been any other technology that garnered as much attention as NFTs. Running on the same blockchain technology as most cryptocurrencies, it’s like crypto, but for another purpose. This course shows you how NFTs work and their connection with blockchain technology. You'll learn the theoretical aspect of the new technology and what function it serves in real life.

item.title: Crypto Masterclass: Bitcoin, Altcoins, NFTs, DeFi, Metaverse
item.description: Cryptos are taking over the digital currency sector by storm, with digital currencies already being termed the money of the future. Many traders take advantage of Bitcoin to earn passive income and diversify their investments in the process. By taking this course, you’ll learn about the fundamentals of cryptocurrency and the blockchain which will teach you how Cryptos fit into the whole digital currency story. Firstly, you’ll start by learning the general introduction to money and the background and history of Bitcoin.

item.title: Cryptocurrency & Bitcoin for Beginners in Plain English.

If you DON'T learn everything you want about Cryptocurrency, Crypto Trading, Blockchain, DeFi, Ethereum, N FTs and more in the first 30 days of this course then you can have your MONEY BACK ..... and you get to keep your free copy of my Cryptocurrency Book just for trying this course.

item.title: Introduction to Token Engineering for Web3 Platforms
item.description: Everyone knows that web3 platforms are decentralized…but what really enables decentralization…tokens… The distribution of value and control in the decentralized ecosystem is primarily driven by various kinds of tokens. Tokens are often touted as investment opportunities but the primary role of tokens on web3 platforms is to capture the value generated by the platforms and distribute value and control among the network participants to incentivize them so that they behave in a way that contributes to the smooth functioning and growth of the ecosystem itself.

item.title: NFT Meisterkurs - Das große Non-Fungible Token Komplettpaket
item.description: Suchst du nach einer vollständigen Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitung um Non-fungible Tokens (NFTs) zu prägen (minten), zu kaufen & zu verkaufen? Dann ist dieser NFT Meisterkurs genau das richtige für dich! Ich nehme dich mit in die NFT-Welt und zeige dir alle wichtigen Grundlagen, um NFTs zu verstehen und mit ihnen Geld zu verdienen. Auf dich warten 2,5+ Stunden Videomaterial, 30+ Lektionen, Begleitdokumente und Quizze. Du erhältst zudem persönliche Beratung von mir und erhöhst deine Lernerfahrung durch immer neue Lektionen, aktuelle Inhalte und vieles mehr.

item.title: Metaverse verstehen & investieren: Die Metaverse Masterclass
item.description: Spätestens seit Facebook sich Ende Oktober 2021 in Meta umbenannt hat, ist es in aller Munde: das Metaverse oder Metaversum. Aber was wissen wir eigentlich wirklich darüber außer, dass wir in Zukunft vielleicht noch mehr im Internet sein werden als ohnehin schon und das 24/7 - so jedenfalls die Vorstellung - mit einer VR-Brille auf dem Kopf. Aber ist es so einfach? Ist das Metaverse das nächste "große Ding" oder handelt es sich hier nur um eine geniale Marketingstrategie des größten Social Media Unternehmens der Welt?

item.title: Blockchain & NFTs (Basics): Smart Contracts to QR NFTs
item.description: This course will be on the development of Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Technology through the SOLIDITY language. Solidity is a curly-bracket language influenced by Object-Oriented languages including JavaScript and is designed to target the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM). In this course, you will be taught to create smart contracts for uses such as voting, crowdfunding, blind auctions, and multi-signature wallets using the SOLIDITY language. Upon successful completion of the course, each student will show tangible evidence of growth and maturity in the following areas: 1.

item.title: Geld verdienen mit NFT - Sammeln, kaufen, verkaufen & Gaming
item.description: Die Welt der NFTs und der digitalen Kunst revolutioniert die Welt und zieht immer mehr Künstler, Gamer und Investoren in ihren Bann. NFTs geben Künstlern die Macht, auch langfristig am Erfolg ihrer Arbeit teilzuhaben. NFTs können jedoch wenig verwirrend sein. Was sind sie? Warum redet jeder über sie? Was bewirken sie? Welche Technologie steckt dahinter? Und: Kann auch ich damit Geld verdienen? Das sind alles Fragen, die ich mit dir gemeinsam in diesem NFT-Kurs beantworten möchte.

item.title: The Simple Bitcoin Course 2021
item.description: (Don't buy this course. Buy Bitcoin and HODL) Wherever you turn, Bitcoin seems to be there. It is in the spotlight especially after the world's richest man joined the frenzy. What is it? Why are people going crazy about it? How did it all start? Satoshi Nakamoto, the mysterious internet figure gave birth to Bitcoin in 2008 as a way to escape the global financial system. What was ridiculed in the earlier days is now a trillion-dollar asset in market capitalization!

item.title: Masterclass de NFT: Aprende desde cero
item.description: Bienvenido a la revolución del arte, el mundo del Arte Digital, Cripto Arte y NFTs llegó para quedarse. Después de que el 11 de marzo de 2021 un NFT se subastara por 69 millones de dólares, muchas personas se preguntan qué es el Criptoarte y cómo se hace. Aquí aprenderás paso a paso, cómo crear una obra digital de cripto arte y convertirla a NFT o token no fungible. Conoce el potencial de los NFT y cómo están impactando al mundo actualmente.

item.title: Kripto Paralarda Haber Analizi Ve Ön Satışlar
item.description: Bu kurs kripto para borsasında haber analizi ve ön satışlar ile ilgili önemli bütün bilgileri barındırıyor. Haber analizlerini hangi haberlere ağırlık vererek incelemeyi ve bu haberlere de en kolay ve hızlı yoldan ulaşarak gelir elde etmek amacımızdır. Boğa ve ayı sezonlarında haber analizi ile al sat yaparken en çok nelere dikkat etmeleri gerektiklerini ve nasıl hareket etmeleri gerektiğini öğretmek amacımızdır. Haber analizi yaparken hangi haberin fiyata etki edeceğini, hangi haberin fiyata etki etmeyeceğini öğrenmek.

item.title: Complete Course on Blockchain and Crypto Currency
item.description: If you are new to cryptocurrencies and blockchain then you may have some questions in mind such as: What are bitcoin and ethereum blockchains? How are blocks interlinked with each other in blockchain? Understanding these questions might be overwhelming but this course will help you understand all the complex topics.I have divided this course into 10 different sections and you will have a very good understanding of blockchain and cryptocurrency after this course.

item.title: Bitcoin 101 - Complete Intro to Bitcoin, Blockchain & Crypto
item.description: In this course, we dive deep into one of the most revolutionary assets of all time... Bitcoin. We dig into how Bitcoin's underlying technology, blockchain work. With no technical knowledge required, you will learn how the blockchain works, and why it is being called the "next generation of the internet." Next, we take a closer look at the fundamentals of Bitcoin, and what makes it the most important cryptocurrency in the market.
